org.azeckoski.reflectutils
Class ClassDataCacher

java.lang.Object
  org.azeckoski.reflectutils.ClassDataCacher

public class ClassDataCacher
extends Object

Class which provides access to the analysis objects and the cached reflection data

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

Constructor Summary
protected ClassDataCacher()
          default constructor - protected
  ClassDataCacher(ClassFields.FieldFindMode fieldFindMode)
          Construct and specify a mode for looking up fields which does not match the default: ClassFields.FieldFindMode.HYBRID
  ClassDataCacher(ClassFields.FieldFindMode fieldFindMode, Map<Class<?>,ClassFields> reflectionCache)
          Construct and specify the field finding mode and your own cache when caching class data, must implement the standard map interface but only the following methods are required:
Map.clear(), Map.size(), Map.put(Object, Object), Map.get(Object)

WARNING: if you don't need this control then just use the getInstance() method to get this

 void clear()
          Clears all cached objects
<T> ClassData<T>
getClassData(Class<T> cls)
          Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object
<T> ClassData<T>
getClassData(Object obj)
          Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this objects class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object

getClassFields(Class<T> cls)
          Get the class fields analysis of a class which contains information about that class and its fields, includes annotations, fields/properties, etc. packaged in a way which makes the data easy to get to, use the ClassData object to get to the more raw data

 void setReflectionCache(Map<Class<?>,ClassFields> reflectionCache)
          Set the cache to be used for holding the reflection data, this allows control over where the reflection caches are stored, this should store the data in a way that it will not hold open the classloader the class comes from
Note that you can set this to a map implementation which does not store anything to disable caching if you like

Constructor Detail

ClassDataCacher

protected ClassDataCacher()
default constructor - protected

ClassDataCacher

public ClassDataCacher(ClassFields.FieldFindMode fieldFindMode)
Construct and specify a mode for looking up fields which does not match the default: ClassFields.FieldFindMode.HYBRID

Parameters:
fieldFindMode - the mode when looking up fields in classes
WARNING: if you don't need this control then just use the getInstance() method to get this

ClassDataCacher

public ClassDataCacher(ClassFields.FieldFindMode fieldFindMode,
                       Map<Class<?>,ClassFields> reflectionCache)
Construct and specify the field finding mode and your own cache when caching class data, must implement the standard map interface but only the following methods are required:
Map.clear(), Map.size(), Map.put(Object, Object), Map.get(Object)

WARNING: if you don't need this control then just use the getInstance() method to get this

Parameters:
fieldFindMode - the mode when looking up fields in classes (null for default of ClassFields.FieldFindMode.HYBRID)
reflectionCache - a map implementation to use as the cache mechanism (null to use internal)
Method Detail

setFieldFindMode

public void setFieldFindMode(ClassFields.FieldFindMode fieldFindMode)
Set the mode used to find fields on classes (default ClassFields.FieldFindMode.HYBRID)
WARNING: changing modes will clear the existing cache

Parameters:
fieldFindMode - see FieldFindMode enum for details
See Also:
ClassFields.FieldFindMode

getFieldFindMode

public ClassFields.FieldFindMode getFieldFindMode()

setIncludeClassField

public void setIncludeClassField(boolean includeClassField)
Setting to determine if the result of "getClass()" should be included in the reflection data
WARNING: changing this will clear the existing cache

Parameters:
includeClassField - if true then getClass() will be treated as a readable field called "class", default is false

isIncludeClassField

public boolean isIncludeClassField()

getReflectionCache

protected Map<Class<?>,ClassFields> getReflectionCache()

setReflectionCache

public void setReflectionCache(Map<Class<?>,ClassFields> reflectionCache)
Set the cache to be used for holding the reflection data, this allows control over where the reflection caches are stored, this should store the data in a way that it will not hold open the classloader the class comes from
Note that you can set this to a map implementation which does not store anything to disable caching if you like

Parameters:
reflectionCache - a cache for holding class cache data (implements map), null to use the default internal cache

getClassFields

public <T> ClassFields<T> getClassFields(Class<T> cls)
Get the class fields analysis of a class which contains information about that class and its fields, includes annotations, fields/properties, etc. packaged in a way which makes the data easy to get to, use the ClassData object to get to the more raw data

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
cls - any Class
Returns:
the ClassFields analysis object which contains the information about this class

getClassData

public <T> ClassData<T> getClassData(Class<T> cls)
Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
cls - any Class
Returns:
the class data cache object (contains reflected data from this class)

getClassFieldsFromObject

public <T> ClassFields<T> getClassFieldsFromObject(Object obj)
Convenience Method:
Analyze an object and produce an object which contains information about it and its fields, see getClassData(Class)

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
obj - any Object
Returns:
the ClassFields analysis object which contains the information about this objects class
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if obj is null

getClassData

public <T> ClassData<T> getClassData(Object obj)
Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this objects class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
obj - any Object
Returns:
the raw ClassData cache object which contains reflection data about this objects class
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if obj is null

the size of the cache (number of cached ClassFields entries)

a singleton instance of this class
